name: Blower Box
details:
Bass DistortionAt first the Blower Box was my attempt to capture the classic Voivod Blacky sound on the Nothing Face album. 
They are my favorite band of all time and Blacky is my favorite bass player of all time. 
I was lucky enough to get Away to do the graphics for it and even got the whole band to sign the first VERY limited run of 15!
But it turned out to not just be a pigeon holed "specific" tone pedal, but a KILLER bass overdrive/distortion beast!
One of my main goals was to make it sound great no matter what setup was used. Small thin practice amp to monster rig.
Controls are Top Left - Volume, Bottom Left - Distortion, Top Right - High cut/boost, Bottom Right - Low cut/boost.
The low boost brings tons of beef and the high boost adds the snap. This thing KILLS on guitar and synths also!
All feedback on this sucker is 100% positive and I couldn't be more stoked!!!
https://www.idiotboxeffects.com/product/blower-box-bass-distortion
